{{Radio station | image =| name = ABC Wide Bay| callsign = 4QB| airdate = January 14, 1948| frequency = 855 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Wide Bay & Burnett
1566 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Gympie
100.1 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Wide Bay | area = Wide Bay â Burnett, Queensland| owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | website = [http://www.abc.net.au/widebay/ http://www.abc.net.au/widebay/] | }} '''ABC Wide Bay''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Bundaberg, Queensland|Bundaberg]] broadcasting to the [[Wide Bay-Burnett]] region of [[Queensland]]. This includes the towns of [[Maryborough, Queensland|Maryborough]], [[Gympie]], [[Hervey Bay]] and [[Mundubbera]]. The station began broadcasting as '''4QB''' in 1948 originally as a relay of the national program. The station was initially based in Maryborough, where studios were built and local programs began in 1950. The station now broadcasts through the following main [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] and [[FM Broadcasting|FM]] transmitters along with low power FM repeaters: {{kml}} {| class="toccolours" border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse" | '''Station''' | '''Location''' | '''Frequency''' | '''First air date''' | '''Power''' | '''Transmitter Coordinates''' |- style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left;" |} ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *Breakfast with Wayne Shearman â 5:00 AM to 8:00 AM *Rural News with Scott Lamond â 6:15 AM to 6:30 AM *Mornings with David Dowsett â 8:30 AM to 10:00 AM ===Saturday=== *Saturday Breakfast with Ross Kay â 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[ABC Capricornia]] and [[612 ABC Brisbane]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=ABC Wide Bay History|url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/03/06/2182402.htm?side=widebay|date=2008-03-06 |accessdate=2008-05-08 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in Queensland]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc Wide Bay}}
